name: @sliit-foss/functions
description: Just a small set of utility functions

scripts.release: pnpm run bump-version && pnpm publish --access=public --tag=latest || true
scripts.test: shx cp ../../.babelrc ../../jest.config.js . && dotenv -- jest --coverage --verbose --runInBand --forceExit && rimraf .babelrc jest.config.js

author: SLIIT FOSS
